label: ham
subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23108 - in
	branches:	SAMBA_3_0/source/lib/replace
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/lib/replace	SAMBA_4_0/source/lib/replace
body: A sixth Law of Nature is this, "That upon caution of the Future time, a man ought to pardon the offences past of them that repenting, desire it." For PARDON, is nothing but granting of Peace; which though granted to them that persevere in their hostility, be not Peace, but Feare; yet not granted to them that give caution of the Future time, is signe of an aversion to Peace; and therefore contrary to the Law of Nature.
